sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { filterByType, filterByName, orderName, orderByAttack} from "../../redux/actions";
import { useDispatch } from "react-redux";
import './Nav.css';


export default function Nav(){

const dispatch = useDispatch();
const [name, setName] = useState('');
const [order, setOrder] = useState('');

const handleFilterTypes = (e) => {
    dispatch(filterByType(e.target.value))
}

const handleOrderName = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    dispatch(orderName(e.target.value))
    setOrder(e.target.value)
}

const handleOrderAttack = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    dispatch(orderByAttack(e.target.value))
    setOrder(e.target.value)
}

const handleSubmit = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    dispatch(filterByName(name))
    setName('');
}

const handleFilterName = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    setName(e.target.value)
}

    return (
        <nav className="navnav">
            <form onSubmit={e => handleSubmit(e)}>
                <input onChange={(e) => handleFilterName(e) } type="text" placeholder="Pokemon Name" value={name}/>
                <button type="submit">Buscar</button>
            </form>
            <select onChange={ e => handleFilterTypes(e)}>
                <option value='All'>All</option>
                <option value='normal'>Normal</option>
                <option value='fighting'>Fighting</option>
                <option value='flying'>Flying</option>
                <option value='poison'>Poison</option>
                <option value='ground'>Ground</option>
                <option value='rock'>Rock</option>
                <option value='bug'>Bug</option>
                <option value='ghost'>Ghost</option>
                <option value='steel'>Steel</option>
                <option value='fire'>Fire</option>
                <option value='water'>Water</option>
                <option value='grass'>Grass</option>
                <option value='electric'>Electric</option>
                <option value='psychic'>Psychic</option>
                <option value='ice'>Ice</option>
                <option value='dragon'>Dragon</option>
                <option value='dark'>Dark</option>
                <option value='fairy'>Fairy</option>
                <option value='unknown'>Unknown</option>
                <option value='shadow'>Shadow</option>
            </select>
            <select>
                <option>All</option>
                <option>Created</option>
                <option>Api</option>
            </select>
            <select >
                <option>Alphabetically</option>
                <option onClick={e => handleOrderName(e)} value='A-Z'>A-Z</option>
                <option onClick={e => handleOrderName(e)} value='Z-A'>Z-A</option>
            </select>
            <select>
                <option>Order By Attack</option>
                <option onClick={e => handleOrderAttack(e)} value='++'>++</option>
                <option onClick={e => handleOrderAttack(e)} value='--'>--</option>
            </select>
        </nav>
    )
}
